roleset.name: ensuring something stays below a certain level

roles.note: Try to stick to instances that can in some way be construed as referring to the event of limiting, rather than the number benchmark itself.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on limit-v.01, WordNet sense # . Corresponds to VNcls limit-76.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Due to this the US and EU have imposed sanctions on Iran involving limits on the oil bought from Iran which in turn decreases their economy and other sanctions of similar consequences .
example.arg: on the oil bought from Iran
which in turn decreases their economy
